description: Enterprise techniques used by Invoke-PSImage, ATT&CK software S0231 v1.1
name: Invoke-PSImage (S0231)

techniques.comment: [Invoke-PSImage](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0231) can be used to embed a PowerShell script within the pixels of a PNG file.(Citation: GitHub Invoke-PSImage)
[Invoke-PSImage](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0231) can be used to embed payload data within a new image file.(Citation: GitHub PSImage)
